overview: The idol group leader of Shibuya-kei girls broke the silence and made a shocking MUTEKI debut! I love singing, dancing, and idols, but I also really love sex. Super soft F cup boobs are pulled and fainted in the first sex! "I've been a little depressed, but I'm fine." She used to be an active idol, but now she's embarking on a new path .
title: Discovery Miharu Usa
